array.string:
#!/bin/bash : ${GNUSTEP_MAKE_STRICT_V2_MODE:=yes} ${GNUSTEP_SH_EXPORT_ALL_VARIABLES:=yes} source "${GNUSTEP_MAKEFILES:=/Library/GNUstep/Makefiles}/GNUstep.sh"
IFS=$'\n' for tehEnv in "${!GNUSTEP_SYSTEM_@}" "${!GNUSTEP_NETWORK_@}" "${!GNUSTEP_LOCAL_@}" "${!GNUSTEP_USER_@}" GNUSTEP_MAKEFILES do echo launchctl setenv "$tehEnv" "${!tehEnv}" done
